definitions.definition: to forgive someone for something they have said or done. This word is often used in polite expressions:
examples: Pardon my ignorance, but what exactly is ergonomics?

definitions.definition: If someone who has committed a crime is pardoned, that person is officially forgiven and their punishment is stopped:
examples: Large numbers of political prisoners have been pardoned and released by the new president.

definitions.definition: an occasion when someone who has committed a crime is officially forgiven:
examples: He had actively sought a pardon from the president.

definitions.definition: used to politely ask someone to repeat something they have said because you did not hear it
used to show that someone has said something that offends you:
examples: "Women tend to be fairly useless drivers, anyway." "I beg your pardon!"
